import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: 'home.page.html', styleUrls: ['home.page.scss'], }) export class HomePage { menuType: string = 'push'; constructor(private router: Router) {} goToTeams() { this.router.navigateByUrl("/team"); } goToAddTeams() { this.router.navigateByUrl("/team-add"); } } Valorant Teams Menu Content Team List Add Team Close Menu
